name: Gravity Switch (itch) (BumpDev)
description:
Controls
  • [WASD]/[ARROWS] to move
  • [SPACE] to jump
Details

This is a puzzle platformer about gravity switching. Your goal is to get to the chest.

This game was made for the 5-days game jam. It was made over the span of approximately 2 days.

Credits
  • Font: Pentapixel by Jarno Salo on DaFont.com
  • BGM: 8-Bit Cave Loop by Wolfgang on OpenGameArt.org
  • SFX: Chiptone by SFBGames on https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
:D
